data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fujimoto, Shinta (2015): Halechiniscidae (Heterotardigrada, Arthrotardigrada) of Oura Bay, Okinawajima, Ryukyu Islands, with descriptions of three new species. ZooKeys 483: 149-166, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.483.8936, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.483.8936
